item.title: UBI and the Environmental Cost of Overemployment
item.description: Imagine for a moment that we paused all economic growth. The pie isn‚Äôt getting bigger, but it isn‚Äôt getting smaller either. Now, imagine we invent an efficiency improvement‚Äîsome new technology. This means the same amount of goods and services can be produced with less employment of natural resources.
